item.title: Vuejs Event Handling Tutorial
item.description: The official documentation for VueJS event handling can be found here: VueJS Event Handling. In this tutorial, we are going to look at how you can successfully handle events within your VueJS applications. This is by no means a replacement for the official documentation, think of it more so as a suplementary guide filled with live examples! If you get through this I would love to hear your feedback either in the comments section or on twitter: @wisnusaputradev.
